body:
One question related to `PythonPackage`'s.

I've seen this piece of code inside the `setup.py` of a python package:

```
setuptools_args = {}
install_requires = setuptools_args['install_requires'] = [
    'traitlets',
    'ipython_genutils',
    'jupyter_core',
    'jupyter_client>=4.1',
    'pygments',
    'ipykernel>=4.1', # not a real dependency, but require the reference kernel
]
```

Do I have to define all these other python packages as a dependency in the `package.py` or is it enough just defining `py-setuptools` as a dependency to install these requirements? In the latter case, I guess that at least I have to check that all these packages (traitlets, ipython_genutils,...) are supported by Spack.
title: Python setup.py requirements
